returns.forwarder: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

params.forwarder: The address of the Forwarder contract that is being used.

returns._0: isTrustedForwarder `true` if the Forwarder is trusted to forward relayed transactions by this Recipient.

metaTransfer(address,uint256,uint64).details: Transfers "amount" of this token to receiver address in destination chain.contract needs to be funded with native token, which is used for CCIP fee

params.amount: Total token amount to be transferred
params.receiver: This is the address that tokens are transferred to

withdrawNative().details: withdraws all native tokens from this contract to CCIP Fee Provider addressOnly callable by CCIP Fee Provider address

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

isTrustedForwarder(address).notice: :warning: **Warning** :warning: The Forwarder can have a full control over your Recipient. Only trust verified Forwarder.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.

 @dev request to this contract

 @dev Also, it trusts ERC2771 forwarder to forward meta-transactions
